name: Ganyu
title: Plenilune Gaze
description: The secretary at Yuehai Pavilion. The blood of the qilin, an illuminated beast, flows within her veins.

normal.1: Performs up to 6 consecutive shots with a bow.

charged.1: Performs a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG.
charged.2: While aiming, an icy aura will accumulate on the arrowhead before the arrow is fired. Has different effects based on how long the energy has been charged:
3: Charge Level 1: Fires off an icy arrow that deals <cryo>Cryo DMG</cryo>.
Charge Level 2: Fires off a Frostflake Arrow that deals <cryo>Cryo DMG</cryo>. The Frostflake Arrow blooms after hitting its target, dealing <cryo>AoE Cryo DMG</cryo>.

plunging.1: Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

description.0: Leaving a single Ice Lotus behind, Ganyu dashes backward, shunning all impurity and dealing <cryo>AoE Cryo DMG</cryo>.
3: Continuously taunts surrounding opponents, attracting them to attack it.
Endurance scales based on Ganyu's Max HP.
Blooms profusely when destroyed or once its duration ends, dealing <cryo>AoE Cryo DMG</cryo>.
description.5: "You saw me, you say? You must be mistaken. I was working overtime then."

description.0: Coalesces atmospheric frost and snow to summon a Sacred Cryo Pearl that exorcises evil.
description.1: During its ability duration, the Sacred Cryo Pearl will continuously rain down shards of ice, striking opponents within an AoE and dealing <cryo>Cryo DMG</cryo>.
description.3: Ganyu can bring down sweet rains as a matter of course. But against demons and heretics, they become bitter, freezing snow.

description.0: After firing a Frostflake Arrow, the CRIT Rate of subsequent Frostflake Arrows and their resulting bloom effects is increased by 20% for 5s.
Celestial Shower grants a 20% Cryo DMG Bonus to active party members in the AoE.
Refunds 15% of the ore used when crafting Bow-type weapons.
Charge Level 2 Frostflake Arrows or Frostflake Arrow Blooms decrease opponents' <cryo>Cryo RES</cryo> by 15% for 6s upon hit.
description.1: A hit also regenerates 2 Energy for Ganyu. This effect can only occur once per Charge Level 2 Frostflake Arrow, regardless if Frostflake Arrow itself or its Bloom hits the target.

description.0: Trail of the Qilin gains 1 additional charge.
Increases the Level of Celestial Shower by 3.
Opponents standing within the AoE of Celestial Shower take increased DMG. This effect strengthens over time.
description.1: Increased DMG taken begins at 5% and increases by 5% every 3s, up to a maximum of 25%.
description.2: The effect lingers for 3s after the opponent leaves the AoE.

description.0: Increases the Level of Trail of the Qilin by 3.
Using Trail of the Qilin causes the next Frostflake Arrow shot within 30s to not require charging.
